root: ^GREEN SUPREME: While we await our surbordinate's return, I suggest we hurry and collect those 5 humans for Supreme Command.
^GREY SUPREME: I fail to understand why we need our subordinates to gather so much useless data about this tiny, insignificant rock of a planet.
^GREY SUPREME: Our spacecraft alone could destroy all Humans in the time we have spent conducting this pointless mission.
^GREEN SUPREME: It is not pointless to survey and collect data. Have faith that Supreme Command will use it to decide what The Alliance will do with Earth.
^GREY SUPREME: But the decision is already clear: they are not worth sparing.
^GREEN SUPREME: Well I disagree. Their enslavement and their planet’s resources will greatly benefit The Alliance.
^GREY SUPREME: Ahh. You have finally revealed your true beliefs. I was beginning to think you to be a subordinate, but now we can engage in debate.
^GREEN SUPREME: I am not interested in debating with you.
^GREY SUPREME: Why? Are you afraid to discover that your kind are inferior to mine?
^GREEN SUPREME: We are not! I’m afraid if I’d debate you then I’d conclude that this alliance was in fact a mistake!
^GREY SUPREME: Well, your conclusion would be the only thing I’d ever agree with you on. Why our kind would be so foolish as to ally with yours I will never understand.

^GREEN SUPREME: If that’s your opinion, then let us finish this mission and be finally rid of each other’s company. Steer the craft (arrow keys or WSAD to move). I will prepare the Tractor Beam (click left mouse button to toggle). We must abduct 5 Humans.
